query:
SELECT sh.url
            FROM block_locations bl
            JOIN metadata m ON bl.metadata_id = m.id
            JOIN buckets b ON m.bucket_id = b.id
            JOIN storage_hosts sh ON bl.storage_host_id = sh.id
            JOIN blocks ON bl.block_id = blocks.id
            WHERE blocks.cid = $1
            AND b.account_id = $2
